title: [Russian]The Faith Pillars of Islam [Samigah]
description:
The Faith Pillars in Russian Language

Short Description: This CD collection is a programme of the pillars of faith in Russian, contains articles about the objectivity and the six pillars of faith that came in an interview Jibril, peace be upon him, namely:
1) belief in Allah.
2) Belief in the Angels.
3) faith in books.
4) belief in the Messengers.
5) belief in the Last Day.
6) the extent of faith in good and evil.
